name: Miraï-J
description:
Miraï-J

Made for Mini Jam 63 : Future

Team : I worked alone with Aseprite & Construct 2. No sound for the moment.

Restriction :

-  Make a game in 72h 

~✓ : I  worked around 50H because I didn't begin when the jam start and I ended also earlier) . But the game isn't finish ^^'

- your game must use this lovely color palette by GrafxKid Twitter - Itch, you may not use un-indexed anti-aliasing or alpha channels.

✓ I only use this palette, but maybe I will change with more color when I will work further.

______________________________________________________________________

Little Story:

This game is about a person which has a unknown disease.

One of his eye can see the future. He loose control of this power when big danger is incoming.

He must finish to climb some Boss tower to find answer on his disease

__________________________________________________________________

Playable with controller, keyboard only or keyboard and mouse
